item.title: 2021. “Immersive Nutcracker”
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Aslan adapted and sophisticatedly arranged Tchaikovsky’s ingenious score of “Immersive Nutcracker” in a modern, innovative digital format for a magical experience in Toronto and all...
item.content:encoded:
Aslan adapted and sophisticatedly arranged Tchaikovsky’s ingenious score of “Immersive Nutcracker” in a modern, innovative digital format for a magical experience in Toronto and all around the world.

https://www.immersive-nutcracker.com/

item.title: 2021. Film “On The Waves Ukrainian Music”
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: In 2021 Aslan worked as an arranger of the film “On The Waves Ukrainian Music” by Ethnic Channels Group Limited
item.content:encoded: In 2021 Aslan worked as an arranger of the film “On The Waves Ukrainian Music” by Ethnic Channels Group Limited

item.title: 2018. Ethno project with Mira Solovianenko
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Since 2018 Aslan has been working as an arranger in an ethno project with Mira Solovianenko, a Canadian singer with Ukrainian roots. Toronto, Canada.
item.content:encoded: Since 2018 Aslan has been working as an arranger in an ethno project with Mira Solovianenko, a Canadian singer with Ukrainian roots. Toronto, Canada.

item.title: 2017 – Present. Toronto Concert Orchestra
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Since 2017 to the present time Aslan collaborates with the “Toronto Concert Orchestra” as an arranger in concert programs that are successfully held at concert...
item.content:encoded: Since 2017 to the present time Aslan collaborates with the “Toronto Concert Orchestra” as an arranger in concert programs that are successfully held at concert venues in Toronto.
